title: SCP-5386
content:

**The Carcass And The Tree**

.email {border: solid 2px #000000; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px 10px 50px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}
.tofrom {margin-left: 10px; margin-top: 5px; padding: 1px 15px; border-left: solid 3px maroon}
[[/module]]


++++++ Observe the following:

[[=]]

+ HALLEY MAKAU'S SCiP.NET CONTACTS LIST

[[/=]]

[[Tabview]]


[[tab Site-12 Director Joseph Cowley]]

[[=]]

[[<]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** DirJ.Cowley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** Containment Procedure Review
[[/div]]
------
Hello, Ms. Makau. Could you please go over the Containment Procedures for SCP-5386 to make sure they're in accordance with the Ethics Committee's new policies? 

The material is classified, so don't access it with anybody else in the room. Your terminal has been whitelisted to view it.
[[/div]]

[[/<]]
[[/=]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Theo Langley]]

[[=]]

[[<]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Hey, you’re the Site's resident memetic expert, right?
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Yes I am.
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Can you take a look at a memetic agent for me?
[[/div]]


[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
What are you doing handling meme agents? Aren’t you an inspector for the Ethics Committee?
[[/div]]


[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Yes. Director Cowell asked me to look at the conprocs for SCP-5386. There was nothing on the page but a strange image. I think it's a memetic agent but I can't be sure.
[[/div]]


[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
You looked right at it?
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Yes
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Not a kill agent then. Send it over.

[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
[[<image MEME.jpg size="thumbnail"]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
hmm
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
I can tell it functions as a joint memetic. It removes recent memories and puts the person looking at it to sleep for a wlile. Mostly harmless, but very invasive. Intrusiveness on par with some kill agents I’ve seen. What inoculations do you have?
[[/div]]


[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Just standard cognitohazard and meme protection.
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
It’s a miracle you weren’t affected. Clearly someone wanted you out of commission. What’s your take?
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
I don’t understand. Cowell has to be doing this. Why would he replace an SCP with a memetic agent?
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Realpolitik, I assume. Why were you dispatched to Site 22?
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Rumors of questionable humanoid SCP treatment, mainly. D class abuse too.
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Ah, the January incident. No wonder Director Cowell doesn’t want you looking around. He’d want to make sure you don’t get him in trouble with his superiors.
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
The plot thickens. SCP-5386 can’t be accessed without a password from the Site Director. Isn’t that interesting
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
**Halley.Makau@SCiP.net Is Offline**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Halley??
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
???
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
**Halley.Makau@SCiP.net Is Online**
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
A guard came in. I knocked off their visor and threw my monitor at their head. The meme worked on them. I have to use my phone now
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
What are you going to do?
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
I’m leaving my office. Can you get your car ready in the parking lot???
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Screw that. I’m going to the amnestics department. This isn’t worth my job.
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
really
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Your time’s running out.
[[/div]]


[[[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5386 |New Message From Site Director Cowley!]]]


[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
I just got a message from cowley
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
They know you’re leaving. Don’t open it.
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
I’m not an idiot
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Where are you right now?
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Second floor
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Go left on first floor reception. There’s an employee entrance you can use cut through the security checkpoint.
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
ok
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
A lot of. Guards help needed
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
I have the amnestics. Good luck, buddy.
[[/div]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
Please help
[[/div]]


[[div class="email"]]
**Theo.Langley@SCiP.net Is Offline**
[[/div]]


[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Theo.Langley@SCiP.net
**From:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**Subject:** URGENT!
[[/div]]
------
I'm going to try run to my car
[[/div]]

[[/<]]

[[/=]]

[[/Tab]]

[[tab Ethics Committee Head Ranchod]]

[[=]]

[[<]]

[[div class="email"]]
[[div class="tofrom"]]
**To:** Halley.Makau@SCiP.net
**From:** EthicCom.Ranchod@SCiP.net
**Subject:** New Posting
[[/div]]
------
Halley, there have been complaints from staff as Site-22 concerning mistreatment of Humanoids and D-class. The Site Director has been told to expect you and the files are on your desk.

Use the normal plan of attack: stay low to the ground and be helpful. Site-22 has a no telecommunications policy so you can only contact me when you're at the hotel. I expect weekly reports, and keep an eye on the Senior Staff.

The plane's at 7 PM on the dot, Tuesday, usual airport.



[[/div]]

[[/<]]
[[/=]]



[[/tab]]



[[/tabview]]
